text:
On the final day of the event to revitalize Enoshima,
"Local Heroes Assemble in Enoshima"—

[Player] had an appointment with a certain person
on Enoshima Beach at night.

name: Astar
text:
...[Player].
D-Did I make you wait?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
S-Sorry.
I had something to ask Saotome...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
No, never mind.
I just had a little trouble preparing for something.

text:
[Player] and Astar walked side by side
on Enoshima Beach at night.

name: Astar
text:
...[Player].
I must thank you.
No, I wanted to tell you something.

name: Astar
text:
If you hadn't called out to me,
I wouldn't have come to Enoshima like this...

name: Astar
text:
And I wouldn't have been active
as a local hero.

options.text: Did you gain anything for yourself?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Yes.
Not only I've met a raw talent for "Santa", I also gained information about a "colleague" (Black Santa).

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...That's true.
I didn't know that the reward for being a hero would be this much.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar
dialogue_after_selection.text: With this money, the repair of my "sleigh" should progress considerably.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Yes.
Not only I've met a raw talent for "Santa", I also gained information about a "colleague" (Black Santa).

name: Astar
text:
Even just that,
I can say it was worth taking the job.
And, most of all—

Astar paused, and
gazed intently at [Player]'s face.

name: Astar
text:
Thanks to you, I was able to
play the role of the "summer Santa".

name: Astar
text:
Until I came to Enoshima,
I had completely forgotten that
I could even dream such a dream.

name: Astar
text:
And, with the form you observed for me,
I was able to bring back smiles to the children.
For me, that is the greatest reward.

name: Astar
text:
Thank you, [Player].
For calling me for this request.

options.text: I only managed to get through it thanks to you, Astar.

name: Astar
text:
If you really meant it,
then accepting hero jobs
might not be so bad sometimes.

name: Astar
text:
If it's during the "Santa" preparation period,
I can probably arrange my schedule accordingly.

name: Astar
text:
...Of course,
I don't intend to neglect my "main job".

Having said that, Astar
checked his device and
spoke to [Player].

name: Astar
text:
...[Player].
It's a sudden request, but
could you transform me into that form?

name: Astar
text:
The form of my other dream that you observed—
The form of the "summer Santa".

options.text: You'll tell me the reason later, right?

text:
Upon [Player]'s approval,
Astar was enveloped in a dazzling light,
and transformed into a swimwear-style hero suit.

options.text: The surfing look suits you too.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar (Last Resort)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, thank you.
When you say that, my heart feels... warm.

options.text: This form is cool too, Astar.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar (Last Resort)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, thank you.
When you say that, my heart feels... warm.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar (Last Resort)
dialogue_after_selection.text: I don't mind you being interested, but that's a bit too direct...

text:
Astar, being a bit flustered,
started talking to [Player].

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
...It might not be a big deal, but
I heard from Saotome that there's a perfect spot
on the sea to watch the fireworks.

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
This time,
I want to guide you there.
On my surfboard.

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
...[Player].
Will you come with me?

options.text: (So he transformed into this form for that...)

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
Well then, it's a bit narrow,
but please get on my board.

[Player], urged by Astar,
got on the surfboard.

As Astar said, on the board
that was a little too small for two,
their bodies pressed close together.

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
...!
Sorry, [Player].
It's just because my body is so big...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar (Last Resort)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
C-Cute...!?
You think of me that way...!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar (Last Resort)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I-Is that so...?
Of course, I don't dislike being told that, but...!

text:
While trying to calm the visibly flustered Astar,
[Player] maintained their balance.

And the two
arrived at the point
Astar was aiming for.

After a while,
fireworks lit up the night sky of Enoshima.

The colorful lights
made Astar's crimson skin
glow with complex colors.

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
...This is the first time.
I've seen fireworks this close.

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
I didn't know fireworks
were so beautiful.

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
Or perhaps,
it's because you're by my side
that they shine so brightly...

Astar's murmur was drowned out by
the sound of the grand fireworks.

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
No...
Never mi—

Astar, who almost glossed over it, reconsidered.
Is it really okay to not voice his feelings like this?

And he realized it wasn't okay.
Because he knew all too well, the pain of
failing to convey one's feelings.

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
It's not nothing...!
There's something I absolutely
want to tell you.

Astar proceeded to voice his feelings in a firm voice,
so as not to be drowned out by the fireworks.

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
...[Player].
I was happy to have accepted this request
with you, and to have fought by your side.

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
That's why, I wanted to do
many more things with you.

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
May it be about the next "Santa",
or hero works,
...and other things.

Astar, having said that much,
his crimson skin deepened in color.

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
...Voice person.
I want you to let me hear
your voice by my side, forever.

options.text: Let's stay together from now on.
I'll always be by your side, Astar'.

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
[Player]...!
I... truly...!

The light of the fireworks sparkled
in Astar's moist eyes.

note:
This choice will not set a flag for the rest of the story.
I apologize for not coming up with a more elegant design.
